Texts.Chs: 失败! 你还没有收集到所需的材料。
Texts.Eng: Failure! You've not yet gathered the required materials.

Texts.Chs: 我可以用飞船的自动修复模块修复推进器，但是^green;我需要^orange;20个^green;来自下面的行星的^orange;星核碎片^green;。
Texts.Eng: I can repair the thrusters with the ship's auto repair module but ^green;I'll need ^orange;20 core fragments ^green;from the planet below.

Texts.Chs: 飞船的推进器已经修好了！现在可以在这个星系内旅行。^green;我们需要修复飞船的超光速引擎，使用^orange;20个厄尔吉斯晶体。^green;我们的扫描仪也发现一扇^orange;奇怪的门 ^green;在这个星系中，我们应该先检查一下！
Texts.Eng: The ship's thrusters have been repaired! Travel within this system is now available. ^green;We need to fix the ship's FTL drive with ^orange; 20 Erchius crystals. ^green;Our scanners have also picked up the presence of a ^orange;strange gate ^green;in this system, we should check that out first!

Texts.Chs: 飞船的推进器已经修好了！ 现在可以在这个系统内旅行。^green;我们需要用^orange;2个厄尔吉斯晶体晶体^green;来稳定船的 HRD 驱动器。我们的扫描仪也发现一扇^orange;奇怪的门 ^green;在这个星系中，我们应该先检查一下！
Texts.Eng: The ship's thrusters have been repaired! Travel within this system is now available. ^green;We need to stabilize the ship's HRD drive with ^orange; 20 Erchius crystals. ^green;Our scanners have also picked up the presence of a ^orange;strange gate ^green;in this system, we should check that out first!

Texts.Chs: 什么？！你还没有收集到我需要的材料。
Texts.Eng: What?! You've not yet gathered the required materials I need.
